task.title: Creating OpenStack RC file from scratch

context.p: This procedure provides instructions on how to create the OpenStack RC file from scratch.
To create the OpenStack RC file:

step.cmd: In a text editor, create the PROJECT-openrc.sh file.

note.p: For consistency Nokia recommends to place your Keystone information in /opt/sps/configs.

step.cmd: Add the following authentication information into the PROJECT-openrc.sh file:

info.p: The following example shows admin-openrc.sh file, an OpenStack RC file, where admin is the name of the PROJECT and the value for OS_USERNAME. In this example, the identity host is located at controller.

fig.codeblock: unset OS_SERVICE_TOKEN export OS_USERNAME=v1234_user1 export OS_PASSWORD=v1234_userpass export OS_AUTH_URL=https://1.2.3.4:13000/v3 export OS_CACERT="/opt/sps/configs/NokiaCA0913.pem
